3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;

5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;

16 class ResponseFormatter {
17 
24  public function get($datas, $pages = null) {
25  $datas = $this->getDatas ( $datas );
26  return $this->format ( [ "datas" => $datas,"count" => \sizeof ( $datas ) ] );
27  }
28 
29  public function getDatas($datas, &$classname = null) {
30  $datas = \array_map ( function ($o) use (&$classname) {
31  return $this->cleanRestObject ( $o, $classname );
32  }, $datas );
33  return \array_values ( $datas );
34  }
35 
36  public function getJSONDatas($datas) {
37  return $this->toJson ( $this->getDatas ( $datas ) );
38  }
39 
40  public function cleanRestObject($o, &$classname = null) {
41  $o = $o->_rest;
42  foreach ( $o as $k => $v ) {
43  if (isset ( $v->_rest )) {
44  $o [$k] = $v->_rest;
45  }
46  if (\is_array ( $v )) {
47  foreach ( $v as $index => $values ) {
48  if (isset ( $values->_rest ))
49  $v [$index] = $this->cleanRestObject ( $values );
50  }
51  $o [$k] = $v;
52  }
53  }
54  return $o;
55  }
56 
57  public function getOne($datas) {
58  return $this->format ( [ "data" => $this->cleanRestObject ( $datas ) ] );
59  }
60 
67  public function format($arrayResponse) {
68  return \json_encode ( $arrayResponse );
69  }
70 
71  public function getModel($controllerName) {
72  $array = \explode ( "\\", $controllerName );
73  $result = \ucfirst ( end ( $array ) );
74  if (UString::endswith ( $result, "s" )) {
75  $result = \substr ( $result, 0, - 1 );
76  }
77  return $result;
78  }
79 
80  public function toJson($data) {
81  return \json_encode ( $data );
82  }
83 
84  public function formatException($e) {
85  $error = new RestError ( @$e->getCode (), \utf8_encode ( $e->getMessage () ), @$e->getTraceAsString (), @$e->getFile (), 500 );
86  return $this->format ( $error->asArray () );
87  }
88 
89  public static function toXML($data, &$xml_data) {
90  foreach ( $data as $key => $value ) {
91  if (is_numeric ( $key )) {
92  $key = 'item' . $key; // dealing with <0/>..<n/> issues
93  }
94  if (is_array ( $value )) {
95  $subnode = $xml_data->addChild ( $key );
96  self::toXML ( $value, $subnode );
97  } else {
98  $xml_data->addChild ( "$key", htmlspecialchars ( "$value" ) );
99  }
100  }
101  }
102 }
